subject: p10715477
Findings: Since prior radiograph from, the mediastinal drain tube has been removed. There is no pneumothorax. Both lung volumes are very low. Bilateral, right side more than left side, moderate pulmonary edema has improved. Widened cardiomediastinal silhouette is more than it was on however, this appearance could be exacerbation from low lung volumes. Patient is status post median sternotomy with intact sternal sutures.
